name: Magnetic By Nature
blurb: Wield the power of magnetism on a journey through a forgotten utopia in this captivating puzzle-platformer

rewards.reward: ACE ============================= \r\nThank you for your support!  Because of your generosity, you will receive exclusive, backer-only updates of MBN during and after the kickstarter!

FIRST RESPONDER\r\n=============================\r\nSmart move, grabbing the early bird deal!  The first 100 backers to donate at this level will receive the exclusive, backer-only updates of MBN during and after the kickstarter, as well as a digital, DRM-free PC copy of MBN for two thirds the final price!

EXPLORER\r\n=============================\r\nWelcome to the Metropolis!  For less than ten bucks you hit the ground running with the exclusive, backer-only updates of MBN during and after the kickstarter, as well as a digital DRM-free PC copy of MBN!

EXPLORER (UPDATED) ============================= \r\nWelcome to the Metropolis! For less than ten bucks you hit the ground running with the exclusive, backer-only updates of MBN during and after the kickstarter, as well as a digital DRM-free PC copy of MBN!\r\n(This reward was updated to include "No Shipping Involved")

INSIDER\r\n=============================\r\nNot only will you receive the digital download of MBN DRM-free, you'll also receive exclusive access to behind-the-scenes development material including a video exploring MBN's progress from the initial pre-alpha prototype through all stages up to and including the final release.  On top of that, you'll get a sweet digital pack of high-resolution MBN concept art posters!

CONNOISSEUR\r\n=============================\r\nIn addition to all the rewards above, you'll get a backer-exclusive high resolution digital Art Book (PDF format).  Feast your eyes on a slick set of concept & production art featuring the characters, environments, and artifacts of MBN's labyrinthine world.
SOLOIST\r\n=============================\r\nAlong with every reward above, you'll score a digital copy of MBN's original soundtrack.  Chill out or rock out at your leisure.

HEADLINER\r\n=============================\r\nThis tier means a lot to us.  To show our gratitude properly we'll give you all the rewards listed above, feature your name in the in-game credits, and give you a copy of every level pack and enhancement we release in the future for MBN!

FLY BOY\r\n=============================\r\nAt this level, digital just isn't enough.  We'll give you an exclusive backers-only MBN poster, a custom MBN wristband and keychain set, and all the rewards above, including your name in the game's credits and a copy of every level pack and enhancement we release in the future for MBN!
EARLY BIRD TYCOON\r\n=============================\r\nGood call on grabbing this reward early!  You'll walk away in style with an awesome MBN tee-shirt, as well as every single thing listed above.
TYCOON ============================= Join the Tripleslash street team! Every single thing listed above will be yours, but you'll also snag a sweet MBN tee-shirt. The perfect thing for gaming in!
SHOWCASER ============================= Complete your MBN wardrobe with a custom Tripleslash beanie, created by our highly skilled beanie engineers. In addition you'll get every reward listed above.

ARCHITECT ============================= Ever wonder what it's like to be a game designer? Now you can find out! Working closely with a member of our team, you'll be able to either create a new skin for the protagonist or design a level of your own to be included in the PC release. As if that wasn't enough, you'll also get every reward listed above.  (SHIPPING INCLUDED)

STEEL TITAN ============================= Take home MBN's robot protagonist as a 3D printed model! Paint on the skin of your choice and display it proudly on your shelf. Not only that, but we'll include you in a private video conference with the entire development team. Give us your input as we work on the PC release! Of course, you'll also receive all of the other rewards described above, including the ability to design a level or skin for the final game.  (SHIPPING INCLUDED)

UNTOUCHABLE ============================= One of Tripleslash's artists will produce a signed and framed one-of-a-kind digital print based on MBN exclusively for you. These will never be reproduced or released in any shape or form again. In addition, we'll give you a digital copy of EVERY Tripleslash game released for the next 10 years!  And, once again, all of the rewards described above will be yours as well.  (SHIPPING INCLUDED)

BIG CHEESE ============================= Such exceptional generosity deserves exceptional recognition! Anyone pledging at this level will have their name listed first in the opening credits as an Executive Producer. We will put your name on a glowing pedestal and make sure to bow to it everyday!  You'll also be able to both design a level and produce a new character skin as well as give general input toward the PC release. Additionally, we'll give you a digital copy of EVERY Tripleslash game released for the next 10 years, and you'll receive every single additional reward listed at the Steel Titan tier and above!  (SHIPPING INCLUDED)
